Combat
Hit Points: 20 Armor Class: 14 (dexterity (4 max); trained) Class DC: Fighter: 14 (strength; trained)
Armor: Leather Shield: Steel (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Club (+6 1d6+1 B R10'; strength; expert); Heavy Crossbow (+5 1d10 P R120'; dexterity; expert); Longspear (+6 1d8+1 P; strength; expert)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +2
Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Attack Of Opportunity: (R) Makes a melee Strike on a foe within reach that uses a manipulate or move action, makes a ranged Strike, or leaves a square while moving
Reactive Shield: (R) Performs Raise A Shield to absorb damage from a melee Strike
Shield Block: (R) Raised shield negates damage equal to its hardness; self and shield each suffer any remaining damage
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +5 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes: Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. mental effects that control actions are critical successes, and foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
